item.title: Fun with Static Site Generators and Travis
item.description: The manual workflow goes something like this: Now, with a little scripting we can have: Most preprocessor tools do have some kind of built in function for this workflow, but when you need to take it to a finer grained level and leverage services on the CI server, then this is what must be done. With our new workflow, we let Travis CI do the work for us in a bash script.
